entry.title: 写在开始
entry.content:
- TAGS

技术分享

  • 五花八门

心情分享

  • 更加五花八门

英语学习

扇贝单词

  • deplore dispatch detective decriminate despoil
  • heed nourish refurbish ingredient confine
  • expedition expend

    dispatch : send to a particular destination

    heed : pay attention to

    cofine : pervent it from

    expedition : organized journey that is made for a particular purpose

    verbiage : too many words to make speech difficult to understand

    frugal : not expensive

    assassinate: murder as a political act

    ambivalent : uncertain

    conspicuous: can be noticed easily

    contender : someone who takes part in a competition

    picturesque: attractive

    rug : carpet covers a smaller area

    collaborate: work together

    satiric : ironic

    TuesMagique

    Does Your tummy ever hurt after eating onions and garlic?This is the sad reason why.

    cramp: a painful and involuntary muscular contraction; spasm,muscle spasm

    nausea: sickness

    hallucination：illusoryperception; a common symptom of severe mental disorder

    topical:pertaining to the surface of a body part

    葱姜蒜过敏，文章过难，我人无

    吉他

    乐理基础

    频率/唱名/音名/全全半 全全全半/本位音/高音 倍高音 倍倍高音/标准调弦：e2 b1 g1 d1 a e

    B站收藏了一些基础练习

    技术好文 电源向

    最近画PCB的时候刚接触电源这方面的知识，mark一下。

    电源保护基础电路（基于PMOS）

    防止电源反接->二极管

    存在问题：正向存在压降，存在功耗。

    解决办法：使用肖特基二极管，但是仍然存在功耗消耗。

    解决办法：PMOS的Vgs<0的时导通，>0时截止。且Rds_on很小，功耗很低。

    具体电路：

    LDO和DCDC的一些区别

    LDO：low dropout regulator，低压差线性稳压器。

    DC-DC主要由buck（降压），boost（升压），buck-boost（升降压）三种构成。

    LDO问题1：效率低，大约等于输出电压比输入电压，所以当输出电压和输入电压相差较大时，效率低且功耗大。

    LDO问题2：最大输出电流只有几百mA，而DCDC最大输出电流有几A甚至更大。

    LDO优点1：DC/DC工作在开关状态导致其纹波/噪声要比LDO差，所以在设计时比较敏感的电路尽量选择LDO供电。

    LDO优点2：LDO相对DCDC成本要低，外围电路要简单。

周末

打游戏 看电竞春晚

心情

想养一只猫猫 带回家了

英语学习

扇贝单词

candid: honest.

vow: promise.|vote: to choose sb.

satiric: ironic.

frugal: not expensive.

dispel: stop people having some idea or feeling.

verbiage: verbose.use too many words.

consent: agree.

invasive: invade adj.

hygiene: personal hygiene.

vicious: violent and cruel.

rug:small carpet.

conspicuous:be noticed easily

mellow:pleasant,soft.

notation:a set of written symbols.

ambivalent:uncertain.

gravel:small stones used to make paths.|gravity:Newton’s law of gravity.

narrative:story.

dogged:determined to continue with sth.

confine:prevent.

apportion:apportion something ->how much should be given.

inquire:ask for information about it.

bustle:v.busy.

interfere:get involved in sth.

creep:move quietly and slowly.|steep: rising or falling quickly, not gradually

swindle:defraud.

repute:reputation.

英语学习

扇贝单词

rug: small carpet.

dispel: stop people having an idea.

vow: promise.

consent: permission.

inquire: ask for information.

apportion: distribution.

bustle: v.busy.

ambivalent:uncertain.

interfere: get involved in.

creep: move quitely.

vicious: violent and cruel

comprise: compose.

swindle: deceive.

invasive: invade.

disorder: badly organized.

devastate: destroy.

erratic: unexpected.

splash: play water.

prelude: introductrion act.

disarm: take away all weapons.

nomadic: travel from place to place and do not have a settled home.

tame: a tame animal is one that is not afraid of humans.

TuesMagique

The Brexit timetable

英国脱欧

实在是太鸡儿难了，但是经济学人读起来真的很爽。

吉他

十二平均律
大调：全全半 全全全半
小调：全半全 全半全全
谈到和弦：哪个调 几级和弦->精准定位 专业
反复的几种标记方式

学习

试了一下电容 真是一种很好的器件
买了淘宝的AD封装库 白嫖的时间代价太大了
周四厂家交流的PPT 明天一定要做啊
发票报销别忘了

英语学习

扇贝

exception: particular.|expect: believe it will happen.

splash: play water.

vow: promise.

creep: move quietly and slowly.

swindle: deceive.

heed: pay attention to.

devise: have the idea or design a plan,system,or machine.|device: equipment.

dispel: to dispel an idea that people have means to stop them having it.

interfere: get involved in.

tame: a tame animal or bird is one that is not afraid of humans.

nomadic: travel from place to place.

prelude: start.

erratic：uncertain.

consent: permission.

synonym: -antonym.

brighten: suddenly look happier./interested or excited.

millennium: the Millennium.

cradle: a frame supports or protects something.

replica: copy.

quotient: degree.

discern: be aware of sth.

spike: long piece of metal with a sharp point.

entrepreneur: businesses man.

scorch: burn it slightly.|torch: huoju.

bluster: speaking aggressively but without authority.

connote: makes you think of a particular idea.

upsurge: up surge.

meditate: think about sth carefully and deeply for a long time.

TuesMagique

The coming splurge on northern infrastructure

  • coming splurge 很酷的表达
  • One even got the go-ahead in 2009 only to be put on hold again a year later.|only->but
  • Under the fiscal rules the Tories proposed to adopt during the election campaign, public-sector capital spending is due to rise from just over 2% of gdp to 3%.|adpot,capital
  • That amounts to

    分成两天读吧 太难了555
    复习比学习更加重要

    白嫖流利说

    scarce: not enough.

    shatter: make sth suddenly break into small pieces.

吉他

和弦：大三、小三、增三、减三和弦；七和弦、九和弦。

AcWing

终于准备重拾AcWing了哈哈哈哈

  • 两个重要的头文件：cstdio iostream
  • cstdio:scanf/printf | iostream:cin/cout
  • namespace:命名空间
  • 程序入口 return 0
  • 变量:bool-1byte char-1byte int-4byte float-4byte double-8byte
  • 科学计数法float a = 1.235e2.
  • longlong 后面要加LL.

英语

扇贝单词

bloc: group of countries which have similar political aims and interests.

astonishment: feeling of great surprise.

aisle: long narrow gap that people can walk along.| /aIl/

cotton: cotton cloth.|cartoon

hook: used for catching or holding things.

patronage: sponsor.

insanity: insane - ity. foolish.

bride: woman who is getting married.

TuesMagique

The coming splurge on northern infrastructure

  • 长难句 because it underplays the potential of big projects to boost the economy of the areas that benefit from them.
  • soft money,hard hats.

    白嫖流利说

    From macaques to crabs, wildlife faces threat from face masks

  • hazard: a source of danger
  • marine: connected with the sea and the creatures and plants that live there
  • ensnare: (formal) to make sb / sth unable to escape from a difficult situation or from a person who wants to control them
  • mandate: the authority to do sth, given to a government or other organization by the people who vote for it in an election

吉他

多音和弦 挂留和弦 复合/添加和弦 和弦倾向性 调与调式

乐理确实不太适合我这种粗人QAQ

AcWing
